post:
**HTTP Zoom**

HTTP Zoom (www.httpzoom.com) is a new brand launched by HTTP Simple (www.httpsimple.com) geared towards the lowend market.

We have, for several years, provided premium quality hosting, VPS and dedicated services. Our aim is to now bring that same level of quality and customer support into the Lowend Market place.

**How are we different from the rest?**
1) We have a long track record in making our customers happy
2) We already have existing infrastructure being used from our parent company, who have been successful since 2007.
3) We use insane hardware for our lowend platform. How many others are using 15k SAS drives in Raid 10!!

**Why haven't we posted much within Lowendtalk?**
Being new to the lowend VPS game we have only just started to establish our brand. 

**Why come into the low end market?**
We aim to provide HTTP Zoom as a stepping stone for customers looking for premium services. However that does not mean that we will take every opertunity to coherse you into getting a premium service. HTTP Zoom will be a self sustaining company.
